Package NationMania.ui

NationMania.ui is incharge of drawing User Interface and Handling user input.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    Class for constructing GUI Buttons.
    For convinience only - extends Java Swings JButton by enabling to set the Button bounds in the Constructor.
    GameFonts
    Class containing all the types and styles of messages or labels displayed to the user
    GameInstructions
    Game Instructions Screen.
    GameScreen
    Game Screen - holds all the information needed during a game.
    GameTimer
    Game Timer - initiated every time a new game is starting.
    HighScore
    HighScores Screen - print to user the best scores played by all users
    The number of rows to display is set in the Config file and cannot be more than 10
    Label
    Class for constructing GUI Labels
    For convenience only - extends Java Swings JLabel by enabling to set more features in the Constructor.
    LoginMenu
    Login Screen - the first screen displayed on startup.
    login can be set by pressing "login" button or by "Enter"
    Main
    Main Screen - loads values from Config file and initialize all GUI screens.
    MainMenu
    Main Menu Screen - allows user to choose activity - enter new game, change difficulty, update account, etc.
    Settings
    Settings Screen - holds Game Difficulty, Update DB and Update User Account.
    User can change all fields except username.
    SignUp
    Sign Up Screen - allows new users to register to DB.
    SplashScreen
    Welcome Screen - test for valid connection to DB.

Package NationMania.ui Description

NationMania.ui is incharge of drawing User Interface and Handling user input.
